header.gameNote: SOUTH PADRE ISLAND INVITATIONAL AT SOUTH PADRE ISLAND TX

article.headline: Chicago St. 64, Georgia Southern 59
article.story: SOUTH PADRE ISLAND, Texas -- Jonathon Montgomery scored 17 points off the bench and Chicago State ran off the game's final 10 points to overtake Georgia Southern 64-59 on Friday at the South Padre Island Invitational. Carl Montgomery added 11 points and Hajji Martin pulled down a game-high 11 rebounds and hit the two free throws that gave the Cougars (2-4) the lead for good at 60-59 with 45 seconds left. Ben Drayton and Rory Spencer led the Eagles (2-4) with 13 points apiece. Jelani Hewitt scored 11 and Eric Ferguson 10. Chicago State, which broke a four-game losing streak, trailed 55-47 with 5:56 left. Marvin Baynham's layup put Georgia Southern ahead 59-54 with 3:30 left, but those were the last points the Eagles scored. The Cougars found an advantage from 3-point range, sinking 7 of 19 (36.8 percent) to 4 of 15 (26.7 percent) for the Eagles. Georgia Southern led 36-24 at intermission.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
